title: Lonely Day
lyrics:
[Intro, ternary picking] (Bm) (G) (D) (F#) x2
 
(Bm) Such a (G)lonely day, (D) and its (F#)mine
(Bm) The most (G)loneliest day of my (D)liii-(F#)ife
(Bm) Such a (G)lonely day, (D) should be (F#)banned
(Bm) It’s a (G)day that I can’t  (D)staaa-(F#)and
 
[chorus, strum]
(Bm) The most (G)loneliest day of my (D)liii-(F#)ife
(Bm) The most (G)loneliest day of my (D)liii-(F#)ife
 
[ternary picking]
(Bm) Such a (G)lonely day, (D) shouldn't e(F#)xist
(Bm) It’s a (G)day that I'll never (D)miii-(F#)iss
(Bm) Such a (G)lonely day, (D) and its (F#)mine
(Bm) The most (G)loneliest day of my (D)liii-(F#)ife
 
[bridge, strum]
(G) And if you (F#)go, (A) I wanna (Bm)go with you
(G) And if you (F#)die, (A) I wanna (Bm)die with you
(G) Taaake your (F#)hand and walk a(Bm)way [kazoo] (G)  (D)  (F#)
(Bm)  (G)  (D)  (F#)
 
[chorus, strum]
(Bm) The most (G)loneliest day of my (D)liii-(F#)ife
(Bm) The most (G)loneliest day of my (D)liii-(F#)ife
(Bm) The most (G)loneliest day of my (D)liii-(F#)ife
(Bm)Ah-ah  (G)ah-ah  (D)ah-ah (F#)aaah
 
[outro, ternary picking]
(Bm) Such a (G)lonely day, (D) and its (F#)mine
(Bm) It’s a [slow down](G)day that I'm glad I sur(D)viii-(F#)iived (Bm) [end]
